method.text: Sift the flour, baking powder and salt into a mixing bowl. Stir in the sugar. Add the hazelnuts and apricots. Beat together the egg, milk and melted butter. Make a well in the centre of the dry ingredients and pour in the egg mixture.
Stir gently until the mixture just begins to form a batter. Do not worry if the mixture should remain slightly lumpy.
Spoon the mixture into a greased, deep 12-hole muffin tin. Bake in the oven for 20-25 min until well risen and golden.
